DOC.brief_summary: The primary hypothesis Khalifa 's therapy bring additional benefit compare standard therapy ( physiotherapy ) patient rupture anterior cruciate ligament ( ACL ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Mohamed Khalifa , therapist Hallein ( Austria ) , work since 30 year self-developed manual technique treat injury musculoskeletal system especially knee apply high pressure skin area injury . This pressure apply various amplitude frequency . International top athlete various discipline report rapid pain relief , even full recovery , immediately one hour treatment . Prior investigator ' study , investigator evaluate one pilot patient complete ACL rupture soccer game Magnet-Resonance-Imaging ( MRI ) clinical test . This patient physically immobile report pain especially stretch bend knee . After one hour treatment Khalifa sign injury like stretch / bend inhibition pain go immediately . Three month treatment , evaluation knee MRI show end-to-end continuous ACL homogeneous signal clinical test confirm stability knee . With study investigator evaluate possibility influence heal completely rupture ACL knee one single special local pressure treatment skin 60 min .
DOC.criteria: totally ruptured ACL MRI verify , 4 week old maximum knee function : Any functional inhibition ( stretch , bend load ) BMI : 1828 athletically active surgical procedure injure knee previous time acute surgical indication diabetes mellitus and/or high blood pressure permanent drug treatment
